## RegisterStoreRoot type

API for Application and Seed authors to register the .

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type RegisterStoreRoot = (storeRoot: StoreRoot, predicate?: AppStorePredicate) => (source: unknown) => void;
```
**References:** [AppStorePredicate](./foundation-shell.appstorepredicate.md)

## Example


```ts
// src/store/store.ts

class DefaultStore extends AbstractStoreRoot<Store, StoreEventDetailMap> implements Store {
  ...
  constructor() {
    super();

    // Register the store root
    getApp().registerStoreRoot(this);
  }
  ...
}
```
